title: No saves
comment: Let me know when restoring a save game doesn't crash this PoS app, yeah?

title: Great app.
comment: Great start, still a few bugs.

title: Great for one game at a time
comment: An excellent interpreter, but I'm having the same issue as Cheshire Noir- on a TF201, the menu button does nothing, making it impossible to quit and load another game.  In-game, everything works perfectly, and as a mobile Scapeghost emulator it's wonderful. But it would be nice if you could fix the problem, then it'll be a five star app easily.

title: Some issues on my Transformer Prime
comment: It works fine on my Galaxy S4 but on my Transformer Prime TF201 the menu button doesn't work. I can't change game without uninstalling and reinstalling, which is an issue :-) Top notch when it works tho!

title: Nostalgia at its finest!
comment: + This app takes you back in time to early days of computing adventure text. Simple and easy to use interface with imbedded links to most of the many possible game roms. Credit to the team this is even free!! - Not all games have imbedded rom links

title: Works very well on kyocera rise
comment: great games, and interpreter works well, i just wish it had a bigger text size' to small imo

Thank you for comment!
Size of text changing in menu/settings, see for font size, font typeface. If this is not applicable, please send screenshot, and I will attempt to fix or change settings.
